short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Soap2day - Watch & Download Movies From IMDb With Soap2day Movies App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Soap2day browser extension injects buttons into movie pages of IMDB, the worlds largest movie database. Simply install the Soap2day extension and then navigate to IMDB.com and find a movie to watch or download. Once you've found your movie and you are on it's IMDB page, look below the movie and you will see buttons just like shown in the screenshot below. Simply click on the stream or the download button and Soap2day will instantly find a streaming link or take you to a page for you to search through movie download links. No ads or endless loops of clicks to hopefully watch a movie. One click and Soap2day will stream your movie & three clicks and you'll be downloading in no time, without annoying ads.
